content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5, y=2.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water
- Boiler (x=-5.5, y=2.0) converting water to steam - currently working with coal fuel
- Steam engine (x=-0.5, y=5.5) generating power
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Burner inserter (x=-5.5, y=4.5) for loading coal into boiler
- Small electric pole (x=1.5, y=5.5) connecting to power network

### Coal Mining Operation #1 (x=16.0, y=0.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=16.0, y=0.0) extracting coal - currently not working (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest (x=15.5, y=-1.5) storing coal (327 coal)
- Burner inserter (x=16.5, y=-1.5) moving coal from drill to chest
- Transport belt (x=15.5, y=-2.5)
- Burner inserter (x=15.5, y=-3.5) taking coal from chest to belt

### Coal Mining Operation #2 (x=16.0, y=4.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=16.0, y=4.0) extracting coal - currently not working (out of fuel)
- Wooden chest (x=15.5, y=2.5) storing coal (569 coal)
- Burner inserter (x=16.5, y=2.5) moving coal from drill to chest - output blocked

### Iron Mining and Smelting Operation (x=15.5, y=70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (x=15.5, y=70.5) extracting iron ore - currently working
- Wooden chest (x=15.5, y=68.5) for storing iron ore (47 iron ore)
- Burner inserter (x=16.5, y=68.5) moving ore from chest to belt - waiting for space on belt
- Transport belt system connecting to furnace
- Stone furnace (x=21.0, y=71.0) smelting iron ore into plates - working with coal fuel
- Burner inserter (x=19.5, y=71.5) feeding ore into furnace
- Wooden chest (x=21.5, y=72.5) for storing iron plates (10 iron plates)
- Small electric pole (x=13.5, y=69.5) providing power
- Wooden chest (x=18.5, y=67.5) for catching iron ore
- Inserter (x=18.5, y=68.5) moving ore from belt to chest
- Inserter (x=22.5, y=71.5) moving plates from furnace
- Inserter (x=23.5, y=71.5) moving plates to transport belt
- Transport belt (x=24.5, y=71.5) for moving iron plates
- Wooden chest (x=28.5, y=70.5) storing iron plates (10 iron plates)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Operation (x=-46.5, y=70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (x=-46.5, y=70.5) extracting copper ore - currently working
- Wooden chest (x=-46.5, y=68.5) storing copper ore (377 copper ore)
- Small electric pole (x=-44.5, y=68.5) providing power
- Burner inserter (x=-47.5, y=68.5) moving ore from chest to belt - waiting for space on belt
- Transport belt system connecting to furnace
- Stone furnace (x=-51.0, y=69.0) smelting copper ore into plates - working with coal fuel
- Burner inserter (x=-49.5, y=69.5) feeding ore into furnace
- Wooden chest (x=-50.5, y=71.5) for storing copper plates (5 copper plates)

### Science Production System
Consists of
